sub_title: Commercial Digitalization | Contracting and Procurement | Team Lead | Lifelong Learner
summary:
I am a leader with 20 years of international experience in procurement, supply chain, process improvement and digitization project delivery. My commercial acumen is underpinned by strategic thinking, outstanding analytical and problem solving skills, emotional intelligence, resilience and leadership skills.

Having spent the last years working on disrupting the procurement function by digitalization and the use of innovative technologies, I am currently interested in business digitization, strategy and technology within the energy transition.

I have an eye for lifting people up. I advocate for diversity, gender equality, work-ethics and inclusiveness.

authors.headline: Commercial Digitalization | Contracting and Procurement | Team Lead | Lifelong Learner

profile_positions.description:
Main skills: digitalization, project delivery, leadership, systems and process architecture, continuous improvement.

In my current role I deliver award winning projects that are transforming the Contracting and Procurement (CP) discipline at Shell.

I lead a team focused on the contracting and post award processes, enabling the CP community to deliver most value to Shell businesses by continually striving to design and deploy cutting edge digital technologies, simplified ways of working and expert CP guidance to our community and business stakeholders.

Up till the end of 2017, I was Design Lead as part of the Global design and deployment of the SAP Ariba Strategic Sourcing solution enterprise wide:  Contact Workspace, Knowledge Projects, Sourcing Projects and Supplier Performance Management. I have remained as the functional owner post implementation.  leveraging the platform to automate our contracting process end-to-end and to bring Shell to a leading position with a fully digitized Supply Chain.

I have recently lead the end to end implementation project of Contract Authoring, achieving the automatic generation of fit for purpose and risk free contracts for 2500+ CP professionals, which was recognized by Financial Times with the Intelligent Contracting Award in 2020.

This is a key milestone on a 5 year roadmap journey towards autonomous procurement.
profile_positions.title: Contracting and Procurement Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Main skills: program management, deep understanding of best class contract management.

Program manager and business analyst in the Post Award Contract Management (PACM) global team, delivering an enterprise wide project that is driving PACM to the next level, and identifying value opportunities of around $ 500 mln per year. 
As program management officer, I designed detailed tools for planning, project management and reporting. I also provided market intelligence and portfolio insights as an input to Contract Optimization Review (COR) exercises, participating myself on several CORs involving stakeholders interviews, workshops and action implementation to deliver savings.
profile_positions.title: Post Award Contract Management

profile_positions.description:
Main skills: project leading and achieving through others; contract management processes and systems.

Lead a group wide Data Quality (DQ) project on Contract Management Systems data: increase DQ awareness and provision of comprehensive and sharp reports and other tools to improve DQ across the group. Delivery trough others (business reps) resulting in the correction of 5 thousand DQ issues in the first 6 months.
Dedication and perseverance in showing the value of the contract management system: by running analysis from different angles that transform data into insights (contracts portfolio, ACV, stakeholder workload, top contracts, etc).
Contract Optimization Reviews (COR): support EUAF 2013 program to deliver a tight and demanding schedule by developing a planning /status tool allowing for transparency and easier monitoring and reporting.
profile_positions.title: Group Contracting Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Main skills: category management and category analysis; sourcing strategy, tender and negotiation. 

Description: part of the team responsible of (lubricant and fuel) additives sourcing, but also collaborating with other category teams and the planing and performance group.
Re-engineering savings reporting process from Lean/ESSA perspective. Consolidation, analysis and report of commercial savings.
Creating valuable insights by business analysis: cost modelling, price, spend and forecast analysis for additives category and raw materials.
Category Manager role covering for the specialties portfolio.
Category and Supplier Management for the dyes portfolio from the strategy phase. Setting up a complex global tender including 30 countries and 65 products. Use of Emptoris tool for e-RFx for first round with suppliers.
Definition and implementation of a new modus operandi for the B2B contract boards and successful coordination of the boards.
profile_positions.title: Contracting and Procurement Commercial Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Main skills: learning and development, cost management, business planning.

Description: Role of business analyst in the Upstream International Contracting & Procurement (UICP) central office, supporting the delivery priorities of UI and CP group.
Successful execution of a comprehensive and far reaching training program tailored for UICP (more than 1000 employees). Recognised as main point of reference for training and learning within UICP community. 
Direct collaboration with the Group Learning Advisor for Contracting and Procurement and key player in building a development guide and a learning curriculum.
Bringing compliance training across UI under control and connecting with the UI business compliance office.
Responsible for the agenda and facilitation of the first Upstream International Operational Excellence face to face forum with success.
Involvement in graduate recruitment activities supporting HR.
Coordination of global team towards implementation of group initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst for Upstream International Contracting and Procurement

profile_positions.description:
Main skills: senior stakeholder management, public sector sourcing, outsourcing.
Description: Senior Consultant working for the Spanish NAVY on its Logistic Support Headquarters.
Set up of a public tender for the single source of supplies, moving from a very traditional procurement to an aggregated demand and electronic procurement including logistics (3PL).
This project includes:
Definition of specifications for the acquisition process and the user interface. Development of systems and processes for the procurement of subsistences trough e-commerce and outsourcing of activities within the supply chain. Definition of terms and way of working for a successful tender process. Pricing of the items of supply and budget adjustments.
profile_positions.title: System Engineer, Spanish Navy

profile_positions.description:
Main skills: logistics, materials management, supplier management, NATO codification.

Description: Consultant for the logistic division at Spanish Air Force Headquarter (material management subsection). 
Participation in international working groups regarding initial provisioning, and attendance to international meetings of Eurofighter and A400M weapon systems.
Development and maintenance of the NATO Codification System (management of items of supply) for the Spanish Air Force. Initiator and leader of numerous ESSA initiatives. 
Training and monitoring regarding codification issues for the Air Force logistic centers, coaching of staff reporting to the head office. Compliance revision of conditions of acquisition contracts, being the main contact for the vendors. Liason among different senior officials within the Spanish Armies.
profile_positions.title: System Engineer, Spanish Air Force

profile_positions.description:
Process manager. Quality and Environment manager.
Main responsibilities and tasks:
Process re-engineering and process continuous improvement. Implementation, maintenance and improvement of quality and environment management systems, process audit and certification (ISO 9000 and ISO 14000 series). Supplier evaluation & purchasing management.  Knowledge management & business intelligence. Personnel trainer, legal requirements manager. Support in research and development of new products, software and materials. Environmental aspect identification and minimization.
Winner of Spanish EFQM (European Foundation for Quality Management) award to SME.
profile_positions.title: Process manager / Quality and Environment manager

profile_positions.description:
Choice Consulting was a boutique consultancy developing and implementing management systems based on standards ISO 14001 and ISO 9001. 
I supported those implementation by delivering company preliminary assessment, offer preparation and review of procedures.
I lead the implementation of ISO 14001 in a company managing the reverse supply chain of sanitary waste and disposal. This project was presented as final thesis of my engineering degree in industrial chemistry receiving Cum Laude.
profile_positions.title: Junior Consultant
